channel.title: Visual Studio Code on Coding Architect
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Studio Code on Coding Architect

item.title: Remote debugging of C/C++ code with Visual Studio Code
item.description: I’m currently porting a proprietary C/C++ financial calculations library to Linux. During the work I need to debug the code on a remote Linux machine. In the article I will describe two ways of remote debugging of C/C++ code executed on Linux using Visual Studio Code.
